headline: Cash App Afterpay Reveals That Credit Card "Ick" is Real with Nearly Two-Thirds of Gen Z Ditching Credit Cards for Smarter Spending
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/SAN FRANCISCO, April 01, 2025--Today, Cash App Afterpay released the Why Credit Cards Give Gen Z The Ick Report, a deep dive into the evolving financial behaviors of next generation consumers based on research conducted by Morning Consult. The report highlights growing skepticism with traditional credit, the struggle to budget effectively, and a rising preference for debit cards and Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) solutions - trends that are magnified with Gen Z consumers.1 This
